cgcloud__Payment_Template__c.name: cgcloud__Payment_Template__c
cgcloud__Payment_Template__c.description: Stores the details of the payment template that's to be used for payments.

LastActivityDate.description: Most recent date on which a user last performed an action on the record.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Active__c.description: Controls whether the template can be used to create a payment.

cgcloud__Additional_PTP_Kpi_Definition_1.description: Reference to the additional KPI. The KPI is written back into the payment tactic product records at the defined product level.

cgcloud__Additional_PTP_Kpi_Definition_2.description: Reference to the additional KPI. The KPI is written back into the payment tactic product records at the defined product level.

cgcloud__Additional_PTP_Kpi_Definition_3.description: Reference to the additional KPI. The KPI is written back into the payment tactic product records at the defined product level.

cgcloud__Currency__c.description: Currency of the payment template based on the sales org currency.

cgcloud__Date_From_Offset__c.description: Used for the Link Tactics feature: linkable tactics must overlap with the time range [payment.reference_date__c - Date_From_Offset__c:payment.reference_Date__c + Date_Thru_Offset__c].

cgcloud__Date_Thru_Offset__c.description: Used for the Link Tactics feature: linkable tactics must overlap with the time range [payment.reference_date__c - Date_From_Offset__c:payment.reference_Date__c + Date_Thru_Offset__c].

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Description based on the user-specified language.

cgcloud__Internal_Id__c.description: Internal ID that's created to ensure that the same short code doesn't correspond to the same sales org.

cgcloud__KPI_Subset__c.description: Allows the filtering of KPI definitions in the GridHierarchyView component.

cgcloud__Payment_Adjustment_Process_Type.description: Defines the payment adjustment process type of the payment template.

cgcloud__Payment_Tactic_Product_Level__c.description: Defines the product level of the payment tactic at which the calculation is performed.

cgcloud__Payment_Type_Formula__c.description: Defines the payment type of the payment template.

cgcloud__Payment_Type__c.description: Defines the payment type of the payment template.

cgcloud__Requires_Funds__c.description: Defines whether the payment requires funds to be approved.

cgcloud__Short_Code__c.description: Unique code that's used as a Legacy System Reference.

cgcloud__Tactic_Payout_KPI_Definition__c.description: KPI on the Tactic - Product that's used to distribute the Tactic Payout.
